name: PaperCalc2
body:
* Go [back](http://hafiscz.github.io) to main page

__Lastest beta release:__ com.papercalc.v2.2b14

## Features
Compatibility list|Windows 7 and newer | Windows XP (Deprecated)
---------------------------------|---------------------------------|---------------------------------
Paper format presets|Yes|Yes
Multi-directional paper properties calculator|Yes|Yes
Multilanguage support|Yes|Yes
About section|Yes|Yes
Clear function|Yes|Yes
Cost calculator|Yes|Yes
Semiautomatic update system|Work in progress|Unknown
Automatic â‚¬ exchange rate|Yes|Unknown

## Planned features in the future
* Calculation history
* ~~DLLs (Custom calculator modules)~~

## Links
* Creator HafisCZ http://code.mar21.eu
* Code::Blocks IDE http://www.codeblocks.org/
* wxWidgets library http://wxwidgets.org/
